brushclient.title: Brush Client Settings
brushclient.render.nohurtcam.desc: Removes screen shake when taking damage.
brushclient.render.visualratio.desc: Allows you to change the aspect visual ratio yourself.
brushclient.render.blackpig.desc: Replaces the textures of all pigs on black.
brushclient.render.timechanger.desc: Allows you to change the time for yourself.
brushclient.render.rendername.desc: Allows you to see your own nickname.
brushclient.render.animations.desc: Hand animations. Maybe lagging animation. Not Recommended used with View Model.
brushclient.render.animations.main: Hit animation <1.9+ for the main hand
brushclient.render.animations.off: Hit animation <1.9+ for the off hand
brushclient.render.viewmodel.desc: Allows you to rotate objects in your hand, change their position, and affect your hand. Not Recommended used with Animations.
brushclient.render.viewmodel.posX: Position of the hands at X
brushclient.render.viewmodel.posY: Position of the hands at Y
brushclient.render.viewmodel.posZ: Position of the hands at Z
brushclient.render.lowfire.desc: Reduces the fire on the screen.
brushclient.render.lowshield.desc: Reduces the shield on the screen.
brushclient.misc.elytraswap.desc: Allows you to quickly change from breastplate to elytras and vice versa.
brushclient.misc.hidescreens.desc: Hiding unnecessary screens for optimization purposes.
brushclient.hud.effecttime.desc: Displays the duration of the effects.
brushclient.combat.hitbox.desc: Allows you to customize hitboxes to your liking.
brushclient.combat.hitarmor.desc: Allows you to change the color of your armor when hit.
brushclient.combat.hitcolor.desc: Allows you to change the color of the hit.
brushclient.combat.co.desc: Makes crystals disappear before the server knows about it.
